name: Randall Lough
summary: Highly skilled and motivated software engineer with over 8 years of experience designing, developing, and deploying websites, web applications, tools, and libraries in a variety of languages. Proven track record of quickly learning complex concepts, delivering high-quality work, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project outcomes.

positions.title: Freelance Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed organizations testing strategy by using a mixture of unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application reliability and maintainability.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, improving deployment efficiency and reliability.
Architected end-to-end testing using Playwright, enhancing application stability and reduced regression issues.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led end-to-end development of AI/LLM Agent UI Chat System, a critical AI feature that became the foundation for all AI conversations at Zena, involving technical planning, proof-of-concept development, and full implementation.
Established frontend best practices and became team's HTMX subject matter expert, creating patterns and standards that improved team velocity and code quality across major feature releases.
Designed and built future-proof dynamic tool system that replaced rigid static architecture, enabling flexible AI agent capabilities and unblocking product development for advanced features.

Delivered proactive technical solutions including entitlements system architecture that anticipated future business needs beyond simple enabled/disabled checks to support numerical limits and complex permissions.

positions.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Delivered key product features, collaborating cross-functionally with product teams to scope requirements and ensure timely delivery with minimal obstacles.
Implemented backend search functionality using OpenSearch for import transactions feature, contributing to smooth project execution and improved user experience.
Enhanced developer experience by introducing GraphQL schema validation CI process and implemented error handling patterns.
Pioneered on-call program development, helping establish and refine processes before scaling to additional team members, demonstrating leadership in operational excellence.
Led technical presentations on GraphQL vs REST architecture decisions, facilitating team knowledge sharing and strategic technology discussions.

positions.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led frontend application rewrite using TypeScript and Next.js, improving codebase maintainability, scalability, and enabling 40% faster feature development cycles.
Architected and developed high-performance internal CLI tool using Go, implementing comprehensive test suites and robust CI/CD pipeline for enterprise-scale deployment.
Mentored engineering team on TypeScript, Next.js, and modern frontend development practices, accelerating team adoption of new technologies and best practices.
Provided technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers, particularly in Go language proficiency and system design principles.

positions.title: Support Engineer
responsibilities: Implemented comprehensive testing strategies that improved application stability, reduced production bugs, and enhanced future compatibility.
Enhanced application security, performance, and maintainability through continuous architecture improvements and code optimization.
Maintained and improved existing codebases, ensuring code quality and performance.

positions.title: Marketing Manager and Web Developer
responsibilities: Designed, built, and deployed custom marketing website from scratch, saving tens of thousands in development costs while improving mobile responsiveness and user conversion funnels.
Developed and executed multi-channel marketing strategy that established company as industry thought leader, achieving 35% month-over-month growth in organic search traffic.
Drove exceptional business growth with 840% increase in demo requests and 1500% increase in contract generation through integrated content marketing campaigns.
Created comprehensive content marketing portfolio including blog posts, ebooks, case studies, videos, webinars, and paid advertisements to support lead generation.

positions.title: Inbound Marketing Specialist
responsibilities: Designed, built, and measured landing pages, email campaigns, and paid advertisements using HubSpot, Google Ads, and LinkedIn Ads to drive lead generation.
Developed content strategy and marketing materials to promote integrated retail operations platform including POM, PIM, DOM, WMS, and mobile applications.
Managed lead generation and nurturing processes through content marketing, SEO optimization, and marketing automation workflows.
Analyzed campaign performance metrics and customer acquisition data to optimize marketing funnel conversion rates.

projects.name: Resume Builder
projects.description: A simple resume builder that takes a JSON object and generates a modern, AST friendly resume using Go and LaTex.
items: Designed a resume builder application using Go and LaTex, enabling myself (and others) to create professional resumes from structured JSON data.
This resume you are currently viewing was generated using this tool.

projects.name: Code Bot
projects.description: CLI tool that explores LLMs through personalized, plugin-driven code automation. Project was created pre Claude Code, Cursor, etc.
items: Built AI-powered coding assistant using OpenAI GPT API and Go, enabling automated code generation, file creation, and project structure understanding through prompt engineering.
Developed CLI tool with interactive chat interface supporting file input/output operations, custom prompt injection, and automated conversation priming for improved AI response accuracy.

projects.name: PGX Scan
projects.description: A once popular plugin for the PGX library that provides a simple and efficient way to map SQL query results to Go structs.
items: Developed and maintained a popular Go library extending PostgreSQL PGX driver capabilities, enabling seamless scanning from database queries to Go structs and complex data types.
Implemented advanced struct mapping features including JSON column support, nested struct scanning, and flexible join table handling with configurable column notation strategies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration

skills.name: LLM Tools (Claude Code, Gemini CLI, OpenAI Codex)
